io.github.rowak

Class AuroraMetadata

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.rowak.AuroraMetadata

  • public class AuroraMetadata
extends java.lang.Object
    An object for storing information related to an Aurora device. This informtion is typically received from SSDP broadcast packets.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AuroraMetadata(java.lang.String hostName, int port, java.lang.String deviceId, java.lang.String deviceName)
      Creates a new AuroraMetadata object using existing Aurora device information.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static AuroraMetadata fromPacketData(java.lang.String data)
      Creates a new AuroraMetadata object using packet data from an SSDP broadcast.
      Note: This is used internally by the api.
      java.lang.String getDeviceId()
      Gets the device id of the associated Aurora device.
      java.lang.String getDeviceName()
      Gets the device name of the associated Aurora device.
      java.lang.String getHostName()
      Gets the name of the associated Aurora device.
      int getPort()
      Gets the port of the associated Aurora device.
      void setDeviceId(java.lang.String deviceId)
      Sets the device id of the associated Aurora device.
      This does not affect the device id of the actual Aurora device.
      void setDeviceName(java.lang.String deviceName)
      Sets the device name of the associated Aurora device.
      void setHostName(java.lang.String hostName)
      Sets the metadata host name of the associated Aurora device.
      This does not affect the host name of the actual Aurora device.
      void setPort(int port)
      Sets the port of the associated Aurora device.
      This does not affect the port of the actual Aurora device.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • AuroraMetadata

        public AuroraMetadata(java.lang.String hostName,
                      int port,
                      java.lang.String deviceId,
                      java.lang.String deviceName)
        Creates a new AuroraMetadata object using existing Aurora device information.
        Parameters:
        hostName - the hostname/ IP address of the Aurora
        port - the port that the Aurora is using
        deviceId - the unique device id for the Aurora
        deviceName - the unique name for the Aurora (a combination of the device type and the MAC address)

    • Method Detail

      • fromPacketData

        public static AuroraMetadata fromPacketData(java.lang.String data)
        Creates a new AuroraMetadata object using packet data from an SSDP broadcast.
        Note: This is used internally by the api.
        Parameters:
        data - the packet data containing the Aurora device information
        Returns:
        a new AuroraMetadata object

      • getHostName

        public java.lang.String getHostName()
        Gets the name of the associated Aurora device.
        Returns:
        the name of the Aurora device

      • setHostName

        public void setHostName(java.lang.String hostName)
        Sets the metadata host name of the associated Aurora device.
        This does not affect the host name of the actual Aurora device.
        Parameters:
        hostName - the host name of the Aurora

      • getPort

        public int getPort()
        Gets the port of the associated Aurora device.
        Returns:
        the port of the Aurora device

      • setPort

        public void setPort(int port)
        Sets the port of the associated Aurora device.
        This does not affect the port of the actual Aurora device.
        Parameters:
        port - the port of the Aurora

      • getDeviceId

        public java.lang.String getDeviceId()
        Gets the device id of the associated Aurora device.
        Returns:
        the device id of the Aurora device

      • setDeviceId

        public void setDeviceId(java.lang.String deviceId)
        Sets the device id of the associated Aurora device.
        This does not affect the device id of the actual Aurora device.
        Parameters:
        deviceId - the device id of the Aurora

      • getDeviceName

        public java.lang.String getDeviceName()
        Gets the device name of the associated Aurora device. The device name is a combination of the device type and the MAC address. For example, "Nanoleaf Light Panels 11:ab:2c".
        Returns:
        the device name of the Aurora device

      • setDeviceName

        public void setDeviceName(java.lang.String deviceName)
        Sets the device name of the associated Aurora device. The device name is a combination of the device type and the MAC address. For example, "Nanoleaf Light Panels 11:ab:2c".
        This does not affect the device name of the actual Aurora device.
        Parameters:
        deviceName - the device name of the Aurora
